title: Model options
description: Defines different options which are used for the model.

batchSize.description: Defines the size of a batch in the training/evaluation process

numOfEpochs.description: Defines the number of training epochs.

numReturnSequences.description: Sets the number of expected return sequences to predict different suggestions

maxSequenceLength.description: Sets the maximum length of the predicted sequence

useContextTypes.description: If true, the types available in a file are also sent to the predictor and used for training.

generationTasks.description: Defines further options for method generation tasks.

parameterNames.description: Defines, which tasks should also be performed when generating parameter names in the same task.

withReturnType.description: If true, the parameter list generation will be extended by return type generation in the same task.

withParameterTypes.description: If true, the parameter list generation will be extended by parameter type generation in the same task.

parameterTypes.description: If true, parameter type generation is performed in a separate task.

returnType.description: If true, return type generation is performed in a separate task.

emptyParameterListByKeyword.description: If true, a keyword (like 'void') is used to indicate no output.

modelType.description: Defines, which model type should be used for the given task.

modelName.description: Defines, which model should be used for the given task.

outputOrder.description: Defines, how the output sequence is ordered. If defined, the array must consist each of the 'returnType', 'parameterName', 'parameterType' tokens exactly once. Also, 'returnType' must not come between the parameter tokens.
